body_html:
I'm not sure what the right thing to do is here, I noticed this when I tried to edit these files and the diff showed removal of ^M.

I found these files with:
find . -type f -name \*.py | xargs file | grep CRLF

presumably we'd want to run some test like this on our non-windows builds?

body:
I'm not sure what the right thing to do is here, I noticed this when I tried to edit these files and the diff showed removal of ^M.

I found these files with:
`find . -type f -name \*.py | xargs file | grep CRLF`

presumably we'd want to run some test like this on our non-windows builds?
